about.text: Linked.Coffee is a platform designed to connect people through random coffee chats. We believe in the power of serendipitous connections to broaden horizons and spark new ideas.

rules.text: 1. Be respectful. 2. Show up on time. 3. Have an open mind. 4. No selling or pitching unless mutually agreed.

prices.text: Linked.Coffee is currently free to join during our beta period. Premium features will be announced soon.
